form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF MARIA ISABEL CASARES DE ROCHA, FOIA ( (b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 BEFORE THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA CONSULAR SERVICE HERMOSILLO so., MEXICO IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF MARIA ISABEL CASARES DE ROCHA FOIA (b)(6) FOR A PERMANENT RESIDENT VISA STATE OF CALIFORNIA AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT COUNTY OF VENTURA I, LUIS ROCHA ELENES 9 first being duly sworn, deposes and says I That I am a legal resident of the United States of America and an 64 years of age and married and my permanent residence and mailing address is 3139 So Co street in the City of Oxnard, County of Ventura State of California . II That I am a legal resident of the United States by Immigration having been admitted on 3.16.71 7 at Calexico , being ussued Alien Registration card number A 30 773 654 . That I am a Mexican citizen by birth. III That your affiant has MY WIFE & SON MARIA ISABEL CASARES DE ROCHA, FOIA (b) (6) Citizens of MEXICO , actually residing at Los Mescales Pericos, Sinaloa Mexico who is/are desirous of immigrating to the United States of America as permanent residents ; your affiant desires to have the said applicants immigrate to the United States as permanent residents.
